IndexPage.title: Code for Taiwan
IndexPage.subtitle: Regular Free Meetups for Programming Exchange
IndexPage.description: A free programming exchange community. Monthly meetups to share development experience and discuss programming thinking. Non-profit and open to everyone.

hero.headline: Using AI tools to code - do you really know what's happening?
hero.subheadline: Join our free monthly online meetups to exchange programming thinking and share development experience

about.title: Casual Programming Exchange, Accessible Anywhere
about.subtitle: Many people use AI tools for development, boosting efficiency but often not understanding what's happening behind the scenes. We're a free non-profit community hosting monthly online meetups to exchange programming thinking and share development experience. Not just cities - friends from rural areas can easily join too.

message_card.user_message: AI tools are convenient, but I'm not sure what's happening behind the scenes...
message_card.join_message: Join us! Let's exchange and discuss

open_source.title: Open Exchange
open_source.description: Everyone can freely share experience and discuss ideas, regardless of skill level

community_driven.title: Completely Free
community_driven.description: All activities are non-profit and free, with no fees whatsoever

innovation.title: Experience Sharing
innovation.description: Share development experience and discuss how to write better code

transparency.title: No Geographic Barriers
transparency.description: Online meetups - join from anywhere, urban or rural

questions.question: What is Code for Taiwan?
questions.answer: A free programming exchange community. We host regular monthly online meetups where people who love programming can share development experience and discuss programming thinking. All activities are non-profit and completely free to join.

questions.question: Can I participate without a technical background?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Our exchange activities welcome everyone. Whether you're a beginner, PM, designer - as long as you're interested in programming, you can come listen to others' experiences and discuss your ideas.

questions.question: How do I join the monthly online meetups?
questions.answer: We host free online meetups monthly to exchange programming thinking and experience. You can see the latest meetup information on our event calendar and sign up directly online.

questions.question: Are all activities free?
questions.answer: Yes! We're a non-profit community, and all activities and resources are completely free. We hope to enable more people to participate in programming exchange, whether you're in a city or rural area.

questions.question: Why join this community?
questions.answer: If you use AI tools for development and want to understand the underlying principles; or want to exchange experience and discuss ideas with others; or want to meet friends who love programming - join our free meetups!
